meanings.definition: A person who habitually expresses negative or pessimistic views.
meanings.sent1: The naysayer always finds something wrong with every plan.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a naysayer and try to see the bright side of things.
meanings.sent3: The naysayer joked that even sunny days have too many clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a naysayer, casting shadows on every idea.
meanings.sent5: The naysayer's words were like a dark cloud over the group's excitement.

meanings.definition: One who opposes, denies, or refuses.
meanings.sent1: The naysayer at the meeting disagreed with every suggestion.
meanings.sent2: The naysayer refused to join the team, citing personal reasons.
meanings.sent3: The naysayer playfully pretended to be against all forms of dessert.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness made him a naysayer to any compromise.
meanings.sent5: The naysayer stood firm like a rock against the changing tide of opinions.
